original_text: King Abijah chased King Jeroboam. He took these Israelite towns for himself: Bethel, Jeshanah and Ephron, as well as the villages around them.
korean_text: 아비야가 여로보암을 쫓아가서 그의 성읍들을 빼앗았으니 곧 벧엘과 그 동네들과 여사나와 그 동네들과 에브론과 그 동네들이라

sentences.original_text: He took these Israelite towns for himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이스라엘의 이 도시들을 자신을 위해 차지했습니다

sentences.original_text: as well as the villages around them
